    • CardGame

      public CardGame(int numPlayers, Card[] cards) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor for the CardGame class.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players in the game
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the file does not exist

  • Method Details

    • setGameLocation

      public static void setGameLocation()
      Creates the folder to store output files. The folder name is the current datetime.

    • dealCards

      public void dealCards()
      Deals all of the cards from the pack to players and then decks in round-robin fashion.

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public static int getNumberOfPlayers()
      Gets the number of players to play the game from the user looping until an integer above 1 is entered.
      Returns:
      the number of players playing the game

    • getInputPack

      public static Card[] getInputPack(int numPlayers)
      Gets the pack location from the user, looping until a valid pack is found.
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players in the game
      Returns:
      array of cards

    • readInPack

      public static Card[] readInPack(String packLocation, int numPlayers)
      Reads in the pack file at the specified location and returns an array of cards.
      Parameters:
      packLocation - location of the pack file
      numPlayers - number of players in the game
      Returns:
      array of cards

    • isValidPackFile

      public static boolean isValidPackFile(String packLocation, int numPlayers)
      Takes in a file location and checks if it is a valid pack file.
      Parameters:
      packLocation - location of the pack file
      numPlayers - number of players in the game
      Returns:
      true if the file is valid, false otherwise

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException, FileNotFoundException
      Main method called when starting the game.
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted
      FileNotFoundException - if the game output folder does not exist
